meta.name: mongodb
meta.description: Dashboard for the telegraf input plug-in: MongoDB
meta.author: influxdata

queries.query: SELECT mean(queries_per_sec) AS queries_per_second, mean(getmores_per_sec) AS getmores_per_second FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mongodb"
queries.label: reads/s

queries.query: SELECT mean(inserts_per_sec) AS inserts_per_second, mean(updates_per_sec) AS updates_per_second, mean(deletes_per_sec) AS deletes_per_second FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mongodb"
queries.label: writes/s

queries.query: SELECT max(queued_reads) AS queued_reads, max(queued_writes) as queued_writes FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mongodb"
queries.label: count

queries.query: SELECT mean(net_in_bytes) AS net_in_bytes, mean(net_out_bytes) as net_out_bytes FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mongodb"
queries.label: bytes/s

queries.query: SELECT mean(vsize_megabytes) AS virtual_memory_megabytes, mean(resident_megabytes) as resident_memory_megabytes FROM ":db:".":rp:"."mongodb"
queries.label: MB
